name: Space Docker VR - [Quest 2 Demo]
description:
[ The demo version of Space Docker VR for the Quest 2. This includes 3 tutorial levels, 1 full job, 1 racing map ]

A “Newtonian physics” space-flight simulator for VR! Get in the cockpit, pilot a spacecraft, navigate hazardous environments, and compete with your friends to become the ultimate docker! 

"There's no drag in space" -- Realistic physics means that 'docking' becomes a skilful task, as you learn to master your momentum. 

Features 

  • Career Mode: authored missions with unique twists to train and test your docking abilities 
  • Additional Procedural Content: Weekly missions, as well as 'on-demand' random jobs 
  • Race Mode: push your flying skills to the max 
  • Re-bindable Virtual Cockpit Controls 
  • Compete via Friends/Global Leaderboards - Unlockable Achievements
